docs.lead_paragraph: Lisa Appignanesi reviews two centuries of volatility in the treatment of supposedly mentally ill women.

headline.seo: Mad, Bad and Sad: Women and the Mind Doctors - Lisa Appignanesi - Book Review

docs.lead_paragraph: “One day after school, fourteen-year-old Carole Klein sat on the edge of her bed in a room wallpapered with pictures of movie stars and the singers who played Alan Freed’s rock ‘n’ roll shows at the Brooklyn Paramount.”

docs.lead_paragraph: A revamped ballot measure to restrict abortions in the state will allow some exceptions for rape and incest, exceptions that some said caused a 2006 measure to fail.

headline.main: South Dakota to Revisit Restrictions on Abortion
headline.print_headline: S. Dakota To Revisit Restrictions On Abortion

docs.snippet: A revamped ballot measure to restrict abortions in the state will allow some exceptions for rape and incest, exceptions that some said caused a 2006 measure to fail.

docs.lead_paragraph: How much a mother eats at the time of conception may influence whether she gives birth to a boy or a girl, a new report shows.

headline.main: Boy or Girl? The Answer May Depend on Mom's Eating Habits

docs.abstract: A male embryo may be more likely to thrive in a woman who eats more calories.
docs.snippet: A male embryo may be more likely to thrive in a woman who eats more calories.
